item.description:
We chose to have this event at The Grand Bohemian Hotel because it's a pretty fancy place so we're going all out with FREE Wine & Eats AND we're paying for parking as well. Can you beat that?? We're puling all the stops. A little about BTR: We are a Forex Trading Co. based in Boston & NYC and unfortunately we won't be in the Orlando area for another 6mos so please keep that in mind about this seminar--we really want to reach out and "spread the word" about the opportunities to be had in the forex market and get our man Devrim "Dev" Akyil out there in the public spotlight as well. Most of all we're looking for some special individuals to join our team and possibly represnt BTR in Orlando. Please print out the "INVITATION" voucher--in the EVENT PHOTO section--and kindly bring it to the event. Here are the event details:


DATE: Feb. 5 2008
TIME: 6pm
VENUE: Grand Bohemian Hotel
325 South Orange Avenue
Orlando, FL 32801

Our Boston Office PH#: (617) 292-2840

Thanks & Hope you can make it!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be probably wearing my favorite green pants and a red shirt.
item.why: You'll love it because you'll learn from a professional trader with 16 years trading experience. Not to mention that we're going ALL OUT with free wine,cheese, ors d'oeuvres? You bet! It's We're just tickled pink to be flying to Orlando for the event

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies

item.name: Boston Trading & Research LLC Meetup [Orlando,FL]
